docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 29 -- Sole leather tanners and converters were directed today by the War Production Board to set aside only 20 per cent of their manufacturers' type sole leather band production for repair of civilian shoes during May and succeeding months until further notice.

headline.main: WPB CUTS LEATHER FOR SHOE REPAIR; Tanners Told to Set Aside 20% Instead of 25% -- Other War Agency Action WPB CUTS LEATHER FOR SHOE REPAIR

docs.abstract: WPB orders sole leather tanners and converters to save mfrs type sole leather for civilian repairs
